#Orbpy

Orbpy is a Python program that helps one visualize an orbit of a planet.

## Installation

The program is hosted on the web via streamlit.



## Usage

```python
streamlit run visual.py

# returns MassP
INPUTS

# returns MassX
INPUTS

# returns Period
INPUTS

# returns Distance
INPUTS
```

Pull requests are welcome.
